metadata.description: From the creator of this summer's Sci-Fi Network TV Show EUREKA, Andrew Cosby! A team of researchers drift on the ocean, lost, in their quest for an enigmatic island that's never been explored. Washing on its shores, they find a dense, terrifying jungle populated with animal and plant life that has evolved along a completely different path. What secret does this isle hold? In the tradition of Jurassic Park, but with monsters more likely to have been designed by Alien designer H. R. Geiger!
metadata.name: X Isle
